projects.name: Tiny DB
projects.description: A minimal key-value database built from scratch.
projects.longDescription: Supports CRUD operations, persistence, and a simple query language.

projects.name: Rate Limiter
projects.description: Implementation of common rate limiting algorithms.
projects.longDescription: Includes token bucket, sliding window, and leaky bucket with Redis backend.

projects.name: Monkey Interpreter
projects.longDescription: Includes lexer, parser, evaluator, and REPL.

projects.name: Distributed Cache
projects.description: Distributed caching system using consistent hashing.
projects.longDescription: Supports replication and basic fault tolerance.

projects.name: Load Balancer
projects.description: HTTP load balancer with multiple strategies.

projects.name: Task Queue
projects.description: Reliable task queue with retries and DLQ.
projects.longDescription: Workers, retries, delayed jobs, and dead-letter queues.
